header.title: Introduction to cosProperty

section.title: Overview
section.p: The cosProperty application is compliant with the OMG Service CosProperty Service.

section.title: Purpose and Dependencies
section.p: cosProperty is dependent on Orber, which provides CORBA functionality in an Erlang environment.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: To fully understand the concepts presented in the documentation, it is recommended that the user is familiar with distributed programming, CORBA and the Orber application.
Recommended reading includes CORBA, Fundamentals and Programming - Jon Siegel and Open Telecom Platform Documentation Set. It is also helpful to have read Concurrent Programming in Erlang.
